dcterms:creator: K. Ritsuka
K. Rudie
dcterms:description: A dataset used to define and analyze decentralized control problems, focusing on the construction of local decision functions and fusion rules.
dcterms:title: Decentralized Control Problem

dcterms:creator: K. Ritsuka
K. Rudie
dcterms:description: A dataset that simplifies decentralized control problems into observation problems, allowing for a clearer analysis of decision-making processes.
dcterms:title: Observation Problem

dcterms:creator: K. Rudie
W. M. Wonham
dcterms:description: A dataset that discusses the conjunctive architecture in decentralized supervisory control, focusing on how local decisions can be combined to form a global decision.
dcterms:title: Conjunctive Architecture

dcterms:creator: J. H. Prosser
M. Kam
H. G. Kwatny
dcterms:description: A dataset that explores the disjunctive architecture in decentralized systems, focusing on decision fusion and supervisor synthesis.
dcterms:title: Disjunctive Architecture

dcterms:creator: K. Ritsuka
K. Rudie
dcterms:description: A dataset that presents the C&P∧D&A architecture, which combines conjunctive and permissive decision-making strategies in decentralized systems.
dcterms:title: C&P∧D&A Architecture

dcterms:creator: K. Rudie
W. M. Wonham
dcterms:description: A dataset that describes the C&P architecture, focusing on the conjunctive decision-making process in decentralized supervisory control.
dcterms:title: C&P Architecture

dcterms:creator: T.-S. Yoo
S. Lafortune
dcterms:description: A dataset that addresses conditional decisions in decentralized supervisory control, focusing on the existence of supervisors under such conditions.
dcterms:title: Conditional Decisions
